item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

icy pimp is pissed at something he seems to like cussing even though he cant anyway this is what you do go into player.java and search for this

		//Giving the player an unique look

it will look like this

//playerEquipment[playerHat]=Item.randomHat(); //playerEquipment[playerCape]=Item.randomCape(); playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; //playerEquipment[playerChest]=Item.randomBody(); //playerEquipment[playerShield]=Item.randomShield(); //playerEquipment[playerLegs]=Item.randomLegs(); //playerEquipment[playerHands]=Item.randomGloves(); //playerEquipment[playerFeet]=Item.randomBoots(); //playerEquipment[playerRing]=Item.randomRing(); //playerEquipment[playerArrows]=Item.randomArrows(); playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;

or similar then take away // so it give a random weapon arrows ring exc. or just make it = then the item id
